body.name: Home-X Mini Broom and Dustpan Set
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 18 mins
features: When the spill is too small for the broom or vacuum, sweep it up fast with this mini combo.
Broom and dustpan nest together for compact storage and have holes for hanging on the cabinet or closet door.
In bright yellow plastic with orange bristles in durable rinse-clean polypropylene.
Home-X is a registered trademark of Simply Home Solutions.
body.description: When the spill is too small for the broom or vacuum, sweep it up fast with this mini combo. Puts a sturdy hand broom and dustpan at your fingertips so you can quickly tend to the spilled cereal, coffee grinds and cookie crumbs. They nest together for compact storage and have holes for hanging on the cabinet or closet door. In bright yellow plastic with orange bristles in durable rinse-clean polypropylene. About 6"L x 5¾"H overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for my purposes
reviews.reviewText: It's a tiny handheld broom and dustpan. Works fine for tabletop cleanup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tent campers
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use on scout tent camping trips. It's perfect for keeping your tent swept clean and tidy. The hole through the dust pan and broom handle is perfect - can carabiner it right to your backpack so you don't have a dirty item inside your backpack. It functions well, dust pan holds everything, broom lines up nicely in the pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact and works to sweep things up
reviews.reviewText: Nice and compact and works to sweep things up. Did come with a few of the Brussels bent on one of the edges which leads me to believe that this will not hold up forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for moto camping
reviews.reviewText: Got this to sweep out my tent during my motorcycle trip. It’s compact design makes it perfect for trips with limited storage. And the bristles were strong!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cute and compact broom but the hard plastic edge is not beveled enough to allow for pickup of dust and finer messes. Not great for swiping up litter or soil for example.

reviews.reviewerName: Erin with help from Earl the cat
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy and easy to hide, great as a quick counter broom
reviews.reviewText: I do like the vibrant color of this little sweeper. I'm using mine to sweep up my big kitchen island.It seems everytime I buy a little sweeper for my counter someone uses it on the floor, which turns my counter sweeper into a floor sweeperI like this because when it is showing/displayed it does have a fun color that looks good with my concrete counter. I also like this because I can easily slide it behind my knife rack to hide it from tempting eyes/handsIve been using this about a month and a half, the bristles are firm enough to sweep the small morsels that tend to gather on a counterMy only very minor complaint, the lip on the dustpan has a slight bump to it. It doesn't lay flat, but, it's pretty close to laying flat. I've only used this for sweeping really small crumbs etc. this is a real minor issue.I think this is the longest I've managed to keep a counter sweeper before someone uses it in the floor 😀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to hand wash
reviews.reviewText: I use this for guinea pig droppings in their enclosure between fleece changes. It clips together and apart very easily. It’s easy to hang from their cage by an s-hook, and easy to wash in the sink. I actually like that it doesn’t have a flexible edge because I’m not trying to sweep up fine particles, but it’s decent at that too—on very flat surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Indispensable kitchen gadget!
reviews.reviewText: Can't imagine how I ever got along without this indispensable gadget! Perfect for neatly collecting crumbs, flour, cereal, whatever lands on my counter top or table while I'm preparing food. Way better than paper towels, which too often create more mess than they clean up. I keep this gadget handy, on a hook near my kitchen sink. Much quicker than any other cleanup device! This helps me prevent stuff from landing on the floor! Best of all, no paper towels to dispose of! Paper towels too often create more mess than they clean up! This thing captures spilled solids effortlessly!
Good quality and arrived on time
Muy buen producto, relacion costo - beneficio buena
Al ser de plástico está un poco pandeado y no puedo recoger polvo muy fino
